# It assumes you want to build an executable from source code in

# There's some stuff to make compiling devices easier too.
SET(KEYWORD "artkSingleTracker")

# Start a project.
PROJECT(${KEYWORD})

FIND_PACKAGE(ICUB)
FIND_PACKAGE(YARP REQUIRED)
FIND_PACKAGE(OPENCV REQUIRED)
FIND_PACKAGE(ARTOOLKIT REQUIRED)

    
LINK_LIBRARIES(
	${YARP_LIBRARIES} 
	${OPENCV_LIBRARIES} 
	${ARTOOLKIT_LIBRARIES}
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
	${YARP_INCLUDES} 
	${OPENCV_INCLUDE_DIR} 
	${ARTOOLKIT_INCLUDE_DIR}
)
    

# Search for source code.
FILE(GLOB folder_source *.cpp src/*.cpp src/*.cc src/*.c)
FILE(GLOB folder_header *.h include/iCub/*.h)
SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files" FILES ${folder_source})
SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files" FILES ${folder_header})
    
# Set up our main executable.
IF (folder_source)
    ADD_EXECUTABLE(${KEYWORD} 
        ${folder_source} 
        ${folder_header}
    )
ELSE (folder_source)
    MESSAGE(FATAL_ERROR "No source code files found. Please add something")
ENDIF (folder_source)

INSTALL_TARGETS(/bin ${KEYWORD})
